text: Wid, segwen, ur nezmir ara ad a$en tiêuôiyn iumnen, ad a$en si teklatin nnwen, tid iumnen. Öebbi Yif akw akken Iéôa liman nnwen. Wa seg wa. A$et pent, s tsriê n twacult nnsent, fket asent arrazen nnsent, s lqanun. D tizedganin, maççi d tucmitin, ne$ d tid iff$en abrid. ÛMa u$alent d tiêuôiyn, sinna xedment lâaô, aâaqeb nnsent azgen n win n tiêuôiyn. Akka i win, segwen, ippagwaden abekkav. Ma tûebôem, ppif i kunwi. Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
